description: Client is a leading American public refrigerated warehouse operator with 38 facilities located in 13 states. It is a full-scale warehouse management system for refrigerated warehouses that includes features for receipt and order management, real-time inventory status, yard management, RF capabilities, advanced reporting and various integrations.
skills: You have three to five years of Information Technology/Fintech recruitment experience along with exceptional customer service/ facilitation skills.
Ability to provide in-depth sourcing of passive candidates by using creative forms of online candidate search (Boolean, social networking, LinkedIn, etc.).
A professional demeanor and the ability to maintain courteous communication with prospective candidates. Ability to maintain high standards despite pressing deadlines.
Experience working with Applicant Tracking System (ATS) and attention to detail to record relevant candidate activity.
